frontmatter.title: Undulation
frontmatter.description: visual identity and landing page design for a Hungarian ambient music label

projectData.task: Develop a visual identity, a flexible visual system for release covers and design a landing page for a music label.
projectData.whyExists: I came up with the name for the label and suggested to build the brand around the notion of the wave. I proposed a flexible visual system based on quarter-circles and iterative transformation.
projectData.metaphor: A wave, both marine and sound one, was chosen as a metaphor. It represents the movement, calmness and continuity.

process.title: Styleboard
process.caption: Composition references for each screen on the left. References for typography, colors and stylistic method on the right.

process.title: Visual system
process.caption: I was inspired by Martin Lorenz's 'Flexible visual systems' book
